entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 7 except minus 1 along the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain inland before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
